name: Tearlaments Grief
text: Special Summon 1 "Tearlaments" monster or 1 "Visas Starfrost" from your Deck or GY, then send 1 monster you control with the same Type or Attribute to the GY. If this card is sent to the GY by card effect: You can target 1 of your banished "Tearlaments" Traps; add it to your hand. You can only use 1 "Tearlaments Grief" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
